item.title: About
item.description:
I have been a system administrator specializing in UNIX and networks for over 12 years. For the last 4 years I’ve worked at a hardware company that makes enterprise flash drives. The main consumer and user of flash drives are system administrators. My latest job title is Performance Engineer, where I’ll be diving into the challenges of instrumenting at a system level, observing bottlenecks, and coming up with strategies and best practice for removing those bottlenecks.

This serves to document the things I learn along the way.
